name: Unstung
description:
Fly, build & protect the Hive!

  • Challenging tower defense.
  • Unique, colourful art style.
  • Intuitive & simple 3D controls.
  • Designed for Oculus Quest.

Gameplay

  • Control Q, the queen bee.
  • Collect pollen from fallen enemy bugs.
  • Build towers with bee allies.
  • Destroy armies of bugs.
  • Protect your hive until the new queen is ready.
  • Journey to start a new hive.

Who it's for

This game isn't for everyone! You might enjoy it if you also like...

  • Cartoon-style art similar to Disney, Pixar
  • Tower defense games on mobile (Plants vs Zombies, Kingdom Rush)
  • Games that make you move around, but no virtual locomotion

Release plans

Unstung will release in early 2021 with 12 levels. Each level will have a different layout, visual theme, and unique gameplay challenge. This early pre-release is a teaser, with only 4 levels. Thanks for playing!

Made by Neomajika

This game is in development by Neomajika. The sole developer, Shaun Norton, works from his home in Melbourne, Australia.
